python-for-this-arc.overview: During development, if using Python becomes advantageous (e.g. for an embedding library or PDF parsing), teams might dip their toes in Python here. For instance, a team might write a Python script to pre-process a PDF into text chunks, then use Node to handle the chatbot logic calling the API. This flexible approach builds cross-language savvy gradually. Others might do it all in JS if they find suitable packages.
python-for-this-arc.essential-python-for-this-arc: 1. environments & package management 2. async programming & API design
python-for-this-arc.stretch-python-for-this-arc: 1. data processing with pandas/numpy 2. model serving & FastAPI
